Appetizers

N.Y. Style Fried Calamari

Corn meal n flour dusted domestic calamari tube & tentacles fried with sliced hot cherry peppers. Served with lemon wedge & our marinara sauce

Garlic Pesto Knots

Our pizza dough knots baked & then tossed in housemade garlicky pesto. 6 pieces per order **There are no nuts in this dish**
9.00 $

Our daily fresh made in house bread slathered with garlic butter then topped with American, mozzarella, oregano & pecorino cheeses baked til nice n cheezy, then parsley

Base

Calzone

Our dough is filled with a three cheese blend of ricotta, mozzarella & grated pecorino romano cheese, black pepper, and parsley mixture then topped with your choice of filling. The dough is folded over itself, sealed, and baked till golden. Served with a side of marinara sauce

12" New Calabrese

Our Calabrese but made better. Red base, fresh mozzarella, pickled Fresno, soppressata, chili flakes, honey, pecorino & when done we add a little arugula and pickled red onion. Small change. Huge taste difference for the better!
23.25 $

Catering Menu

View our catering menu below, then contact us at the restaurant to make an order!

Appetizers

Dough Knots

Our dough tied baked and dressed
(30 piece / order) 
Antipasti

Mortadella, coppa, Genoa salami, artichoke, giardiniera, roast pepper, grana padano, sharp provolone and fontina

Eggplant Rollatini

We grill & marinate our sliced eggplant then stuff & roll with ricotta, mozzarella, pecorino & herbs. Then top with sauced, and baked
(22 piece) 
Italian Housemade Sausage Peppers & Onions

Our housemade mild sausage links, roasted, sliced then tossed with oven roasted peppers, sautéed onions together with a touch of marinara sauce fresh parsley and finished with grated pecorino

Grilled Vegetables

We grill sliced, onion, eggplant, green & yellow zucchini, colored peppers and then dress with a vinaigrette, fresh mint, fresh parsley and Spanish EVOO to finish

Tollis Rosemary Roasted Potato

Take peeled potato, quarter lengthwise, then oil, fresh rosemary, salt, pepper, garlic and roast til crisp on outside but moist inside

Golden Moist Fried Jumbo Wings

Jumbo wings, flats & drums, floured with house seasonings, fried til crisp and moist, then dressed with sauce of choice. Dry, Italian sweet & spicy, BBQ, or our buffalo sauce

Cream Cheese and Crab Stuffed Mushrooms

We use leg and claw crab meat together with cream cheese, herbs and seasonings, mix together and fill caps then top with panko, butter and bake

Sausage And Herb Stuffing, Stuffed Mushrooms

We do a sausage and mushroom mix, sauté with garlic and shallots then add some moistened bread with chicken stock to make a dressing then put into caps and bake

Chicken

Chicken Marsala

Mushroom, marsala, butter with floured tenders

Chicken Picatta

Traditional lemon caper piccata sauce with sauteed floured tenders finished with sliced lemon wheels and fresh parsley. Can add penne pasta as an add on option, finished in same lemon caper piccata sauce

Chicken Parmigiano

Our cutlets fried then layered on sauce then topped with more sauce, mozzarella and pecorino cheese, then baked til cheese just melts. You can order it over penne that is finished in a bechamel sauce under chicken for a nice twist

Chicken Francese

Our cutlets, floured dredged, egg-dipped, sautéed with a lemon butter and white wine sauce

Chicken Al Forno

Leg & thigh meat baked with onions, peas, garlic, rosemary & potato. On the bone, old school Italian

Fish Selection

Scrod Oreganato

Filets of scrod seasoned with salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, oregano, sliced green & Kalamata olives, crushed tomato, white wine, parsley & EVOO & a cracker panko crumb. Baked to perfection

Baked Stuffed Filet Of Sole

We take a good size filet of sole line it with herbs, crab meat, and a light cracker crumb filling, roll it up bake and dress with a meuniere sauce to finish

Salads

House Chop Salad

Romaine, grape tomato, diced red onion, sliced cherry peppers, sliced green olives, crisp bacon crumble & house vinaigrette

Caesar Salad

Housemade croutons, shaved grana padano finished with our housemade dressing. You can add grilled chicken tenders seasoned with herbs, grilled, sliced, and dressed

Pasta

Baked Penne

Meatball crumbles, ricotta, mozzarella, pecorino house tomato sauce, and parsley tossed with pasta and baked crispy

Penne Vodka

Our house vodka cream sauce, made with onion, bacon, peas, marinara and pecorino, tossed with penne pasta & finished with fresh pecorino cheese

Manicotti Di Tolli

Light egg noodle, housemade and rolled with ricotta, pecorino, pepper, mozzarella then topped with our marinara sauce then baked
(12 piece minimum) 
Penne Rigate Marinara

Our plain marinara sauce tossed with penne rigate to hold the sauce and finished with fresh basil and pecorino cheese. You can add housemade beef meatballs

Italian Macaroni & 3 Cheese

Traditional elbow pasta tossed with our three cheese bechamel sauce, then we add panko chip crumb and bake. You can add shrimp or lobster meat to make it special

Tollis Lasagna (Vegetable or Meat)

Our egg noodle pasta sheet five layers with ricotta, mozzarella, herbs and seasonings together with either crumbled meatballs or veggies consisting of broccoli, spinach, slice tomato and roasted portobello with ricotta, mozzarella, marinara sauce and baked off

Catering Menu

View our catering menu below, then contact us at the restaurant to make an order!

Appetizers

Dough Knots

Our dough tied baked and dressed
(30 piece / order) 
Antipasti

Mortadella, coppa, Genoa salami, artichoke, giardiniera, roast pepper, grana padano, sharp provolone and fontina

Eggplant Rollatini

We grill & marinate our sliced eggplant then stuff & roll with ricotta, mozzarella, pecorino & herbs. Then top with sauced, and baked
(22 piece) 
Italian Housemade Sausage Peppers & Onions

Our housemade mild sausage links, roasted, sliced then tossed with oven roasted peppers, sautéed onions together with a touch of marinara sauce fresh parsley and finished with grated pecorino

Grilled Vegetables

We grill sliced, onion, eggplant, green & yellow zucchini, colored peppers and then dress with a vinaigrette, fresh mint, fresh parsley and Spanish EVOO to finish

Tollis Rosemary Roasted Potato

Take peeled potato, quarter lengthwise, then oil, fresh rosemary, salt, pepper, garlic and roast til crisp on outside but moist inside

Golden Moist Fried Jumbo Wings

Jumbo wings, flats & drums, floured with house seasonings, fried til crisp and moist, then dressed with sauce of choice. Dry, Italian sweet & spicy, BBQ, or our buffalo sauce

Cream Cheese and Crab Stuffed Mushrooms

We use leg and claw crab meat together with cream cheese, herbs and seasonings, mix together and fill caps then top with panko, butter and bake

Sausage And Herb Stuffing, Stuffed Mushrooms

We do a sausage and mushroom mix, sauté with garlic and shallots then add some moistened bread with chicken stock to make a dressing then put into caps and bake

Chicken

Chicken Marsala

Mushroom, marsala, butter with floured tenders

Chicken Picatta

Traditional lemon caper piccata sauce with sauteed floured tenders finished with sliced lemon wheels and fresh parsley. Can add penne pasta as an add on option, finished in same lemon caper piccata sauce

Chicken Parmigiano

Our cutlets fried then layered on sauce then topped with more sauce, mozzarella and pecorino cheese, then baked til cheese just melts. You can order it over penne that is finished in a bechamel sauce under chicken for a nice twist

Chicken Francese

Our cutlets, floured dredged, egg-dipped, sautéed with a lemon butter and white wine sauce

Chicken Al Forno

Leg & thigh meat baked with onions, peas, garlic, rosemary & potato. On the bone, old school Italian

Fish Selection

Scrod Oreganato

Filets of scrod seasoned with salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, oregano, sliced green & Kalamata olives, crushed tomato, white wine, parsley & EVOO & a cracker panko crumb. Baked to perfection

Baked Stuffed Filet Of Sole

We take a good size filet of sole line it with herbs, crab meat, and a light cracker crumb filling, roll it up bake and dress with a meuniere sauce to finish

Salads

House Chop Salad

Romaine, grape tomato, diced red onion, sliced cherry peppers, sliced green olives, crisp bacon crumble & house vinaigrette

Caesar Salad

Housemade croutons, shaved grana padano finished with our housemade dressing. You can add grilled chicken tenders seasoned with herbs, grilled, sliced, and dressed

Pasta

Baked Penne

Meatball crumbles, ricotta, mozzarella, pecorino house tomato sauce, and parsley tossed with pasta and baked crispy

Penne Vodka

Our house vodka cream sauce, made with onion, bacon, peas, marinara and pecorino, tossed with penne pasta & finished with fresh pecorino cheese

Manicotti Di Tolli

Light egg noodle, housemade and rolled with ricotta, pecorino, pepper, mozzarella then topped with our marinara sauce then baked
(12 piece minimum) 
Penne Rigate Marinara

Our plain marinara sauce tossed with penne rigate to hold the sauce and finished with fresh basil and pecorino cheese. You can add housemade beef meatballs

Italian Macaroni & 3 Cheese

Traditional elbow pasta tossed with our three cheese bechamel sauce, then we add panko chip crumb and bake. You can add shrimp or lobster meat to make it special

Tollis Lasagna (Vegetable or Meat)

Our egg noodle pasta sheet five layers with ricotta, mozzarella, herbs and seasonings together with either crumbled meatballs or veggies consisting of broccoli, spinach, slice tomato and roasted portobello with ricotta, mozzarella, marinara sauce and baked off
